item.title: Fixing Hugo Upgrade Errors
item.description:
Upgrading Hugo to the latest version can break older sites and themes due to deprecated functions. When I updated this site (originally built years ago with the hugo-clarity theme), hugo server threw multiple errors.

This guide walks through exactly what I changed to fix Hugo upgrade errors so you can get your site building again without altering your design or content.

Common Hugo Upgrade Errors
